CustomField.formula: CASE( ActivityType__c, '1', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif ","yellow",20, 70), '3', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif ","yellow",20, 70), '4', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif ","green",20, 70), '2', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif ","green",20, 70), '5', IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif ","red",20, 70), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif ","red",20, 70))
CustomField.label: Activity Type Color
